oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A new and accurate map of the English empire in North America : representing their rightful claim as confirm'd by charters, & the formal surrender of their Indian friends; likewise the encroachments of the French, with the several forts they have unjustly erected therein / by R. Bennett engraver.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bennett, Richard.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vignaud Maps.; Maps shelf.; North America, East of the Mississippi--Maps.; United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps.
